## DCons.sort() method

Merge sort implementation based on Simon Tatham's algorithm: https://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/\~sgtatham/algorithms/listsort.html

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sort(cmp?: Comparator<T>): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cmp | <code>Comparator&lt;T&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`

## Remarks

Uses [compare](./compare.compare.md) as default comparator.
